title: Search for contract
custom_steps:
1. Go to Advanced Search on Left and select Major Contract as the Search Type.
 
2. Go to Add New Filter, select Contract Type, then select any type of contract.
 
3. Click Search
custom_expected: Contract opens in view mode based on the user's permissions and the contract's status.

title: Verify rules
custom_steps:
Can view and update the entire contract in any status 
Can change contract status from/to any other status of contract

title: Search for contract
custom_steps:
1. Go to Advanced Search on Left and select Major Contract as the Search Type.
 
2. Go to Add New Filter, select Contract Type, then select any type of contract.
 
3. Click Search
custom_expected: Contract opens in view mode based on the user's permissions and the contract's status.

title: Verify rules
custom_steps:
Can view the contract for a player in their org in any status. 

Can update full details of contract in Preliminary status only. 

Can update only language of contract in Terms Submitted, Terms Confirmed, and Update Pending Approval and Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) statuses.

Can only update the attachments of the contract in Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Terms Confirmed, Ready for Signature and Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed), Update Pending Approval and Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) statuses. 

Can make the following state changes: Delete a preliminary contract (Preliminary -> Deleted) Submit the terms of a contract (Preliminary -> Terms Submitted) Ready a contract for signature (Preliminary -> Ready for Signature and Terms Confirmed -> Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)) Move a signature ready contract back to preliminary to update contract details (Ready for Signature -> Preliminary) Move a confirmed signature ready contract back to confirmed to update language (Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) -> Terms Confirmed) Submit contract for approval by either having the contract e-signed or uploading the signed contract as a PDF (Ready for Signature -> Pending Approval) for both already confirmed and not yet confirmed contracts

title: Search for contract
custom_steps:
1. Go to Advanced Search on Left and select Major Contract as the Search Type.
 
2. Go to Add New Filter, select Status, then select Terms Submitted. Add another filter, select Signing Org, select NYY. 

3. Click Search
custom_expected: Search results displayed

title: Select and edit player with terms submitted status
custom_steps:
1. Under Search Results, select a player and click his contract status under the Contract Status column

2. Click edit on player's contract
custom_expected:
1. Goes to contract in view mode

2. Contract goes into edit mode

title: Move contract to terms confirmed
custom_steps: Scroll down to the Complete section and update status to "Terms Confirmed"
custom_expected:
System updates Contract Status to "Terms Confirmed". 

System shows successful update blue info notification and reloads the contract in view mode with the new status. 

Verify contract appears on Club user's Notifications clipboard

title: Search for contract
custom_steps:
Go to Advanced Search on Left and open up the previously updated contract (it is currently in Update Pending Approval status)

Click edit on contract
custom_expected:
Contract displayed in view mode

Contract goes to edit mode

title: Update contract to Pending Approval
custom_steps:
1. Make necessary edits to contract.

2. After changes to contract are made, scroll down to the Complete Section and select "Pending Approval" then hit "Update Status" button
custom_expected:
System updates Contract Status to  Pending Approval 

System shows successful update blue info notification and reloads the contract in view mode with the new status.
